§ 13126. Reports to Congress The Director shall, no later than April 30 of each year in which the second session of a Congress begins, submit to the Congress a report containing—(1) a summary of the actions taken by the Director during a 2-year period ending on December 31 of the preceding year in order to carry out the Director’s functions and responsibilities under this subchapter; and
(2) such other information as the Director may consider appropriate.
(Pub. L. 117–286, § 3(c), Dec. 27, 2022, 136 Stat. 4302.)
